roleset.name: remove

example.name: transitive
example.text: Researchers Wang Zhongjiang and Zhang Baoming of the Henan Academy of Social Sciences excerpted six million Chinese characters of text from New Youth magazine, which they arranged *T* according to philosophical viewpoint, language, and intellectual trends in society.
example.arg: Researchers Wang Zhongjiang and Zhang Baoming of the Henan Academy of Social Sciences
six million Chinese characters of text from New Youth magazine
example.note: The Treebanking of this example includes the source as part of the object NP. If Treebanked differently, "from New Youth magazine" would be ARG 2.

roleset.note: Based on ECTB 2. No VNcls. Comparison with 'extract' and 'remove'.
